MountOptions.description: The mount options used by DataSync to access the SMB server.

Version.description: The specific SMB version that you want DataSync to use to mount your SMB share.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for an AWS resource tag.

Value.description: The value for an AWS resource tag.

AgentArns.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of agents to use for a Simple Message Block (SMB) location.
AgentArns.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of agents to use for a Simple Message Block (SMB) location.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

Domain.description: The name of the Windows domain that the SMB server belongs to.
Domain.markdownDescription:
The name of the Windows domain that the SMB server belongs to.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 253  

Pattern: ^([A-Za-z0-9]+[A-Za-z0-9-.]*)*[A-Za-z0-9-]*[A-Za-z0-9]$  

Update requires: No interruption

MountOptions.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type:      

Update requires: No interruption

Password.description: The password of the user who can mount the share and has the permissions to access files and folders in the SMB share.
Password.markdownDescription:
The password of the user who can mount the share and has the permissions to access files and folders in the SMB share.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 104  

Pattern: ^.{0,104}$  

Update requires: No interruption

ServerHostname.description: The name of the SMB server. This value is the IP address or Domain Name Service (DNS) name of the SMB server.
ServerHostname.markdownDescription:
The name of the SMB server. This value is the IP address or Domain Name Service (DNS) name of the SMB server.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 255  

Pattern: ^(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]*[a-zA-Z0-9])\.)*([A-Za-z0-9\-]*[A-Za-z0-9])$  

Update requires: No interruption

Subdirectory.description: The subdirectory in the SMB file system that is used to read data from the SMB source location or write data to the SMB destination
Subdirectory.markdownDescription:
The subdirectory in the SMB file system that is used to read data from the SMB source location or write data to the SMB destination

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 4096  

Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_\-\+\./\(\)\$\p{Zs}]+$  

Update requires: No interruption

User.description: The user who can mount the share, has the permissions to access files and folders in the SMB share.
User.markdownDescription:
The user who can mount the share, has the permissions to access files and folders in the SMB share.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 104  

Pattern: ^[^\x5B\x5D\\/:;|=,+*?]{1,104}$  

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

LocationArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SMB location that is created.
LocationArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the SMB location that is created.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso|aws-iso-b):datasync:[a-z\-0-9]+:[0-9]{12}:location/loc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  

Update requires: No interruption

LocationUri.description: The URL of the SMB location that was described.
LocationUri.markdownDescription:
The URL of the SMB location that was described.

---

Required: No

Type: string   

Maximum Length: 4356  

Pattern: ^(efs|nfs|s3|smb|fsxw)://[a-zA-Z0-9./\-]+$  

Update requires: No interruption
